enhanced_by.reason: The method deferredChangeToString relies on valueToString to convert the inner value to a string.
The method deferredChangeToString may indirectly use changedToString if the DeferredChanged object contains a Changed object.
Both methods return a string representation of an object, making valueToString a good candidate for assertions.
Both methods handle the conversion of specific types (DeferredChanged and Changed) to strings, making changedToString a good candidate for assertions.
